text: I'm coaching my five-year-old nephews
tea ball team and it's fun it's great
I'm the head coach and I make all these
inspirational speeches before the games
get these kids all riled up and I use
old movie quotes because they've never
seen movies before but gather up kids
there's a lot of glory to be had out of
that field you just get a reach out with
two fists and grab it it's not the size
of the man it's the size of the heart
that beats within the man do or do not
there is no try yeah look at those kids
over there they can't handle the truth I
pity the fool that tries to beat us
today nobody and I mean nobody puts Baby
in a corner
once you go out there and live off the
land dude it takes to survive eat things
gonna make a billy goat puke wax on wax
off sweep the leg use the jab shoot the
glass say hello with your little friend
because they may take our lives
[Applause]
we've lost every game
